markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Threatening Approach](/Actions.aspx?ID=317) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 57 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You Stride to be adjacent to a foe and Demoralize that foe. If you succeed, the foe is frightened 2 instead of frightened 1.
name: Threatening Approach
